reviewText: This is a documentary film which shows exactly what happens when Palestinians demonstrate peacefully against the barrier which stops them from going to their olive trees or fields. I have been  demonstrating with them a number of times  and the brutality of the soldiers is totally unbelievable. Israeli governments are obviously unaware of the impact this violence will have on their own young people who follow orders but will one day stop and think about what they have done. Many of them commit suicide after their time in the army and quite a lot of army veterans, including officers, denounce this situation. In the long term Israel will suffer..
A video that shows protest to the existence of Jews... It seem to have been filmed by some worthless college students.
